author: nicko
msg: Cleaned up PatternLayout(string) constructor. Added more docs about ActivateOptions() method

author: nicko
msg: Update to the SmtpAppender from Al Little.
Added SMTP Basic (username & password) and NTML (Windows Integrated) authentication to the SmtpAppender.
Added property to allow the SMTP server port to be set.
These features are only available on .NET 1.1 runtime using CDO as the mail client implementation.
